channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: UBS downgrades GM, cuts Tesla price target as tariff pressure increases
item.description: UBS' new price target for General Motors still implies that shares could gain 11% from their current valuations.

item.title: Tesla gets price target cut from three Wall Street shops
item.description: Mizuho's price target cut still implies Tesla stock could rise 38% from here, while UBS' new forecast is roughly 30% below the stock's Wednesday close...

item.title: This restaurant software stock gets a double upgrade from Wells Fargo
item.description: Wells Fargo sees shares of Toast rising 13% from here.

item.title: Buy the dip on 'ad tech's best executor', Morgan Stanley says
item.description: Analyst Matthew Cost upgraded the mobile ad company to overweight from equal weight.

item.title: Trump's morning 'buy' call nets huge returns for those who listened
item.description: CNBC calculated how much well-known holdings rallied between when Trump posted and session highs.
